pages.title: Tip:1
pages.text: I recommend you take a flag with you!$(br)It marks your achievement of getting to that planet, as well as a way to personalise your bases on different planets

pages.title: Tip:2
pages.text: The moon has cheese! Get some, its good!$(br)Though there is something a bit off about the flavour,it seems a bit too stale....?

pages.title: Tip:3
pages.text: You know what would be awesome? Drifting on another planet.$(br)And hey! if you leave tracks, you now have a easy way going back?Its also good for travel you know?The moon is quite barren.

pages.title: Tip:4
pages.text: Interact [crouch+right click] with the lander when you reach your destination,It would be nice to get your rcckrt back,ESPECIALLY when you worked hard getting all the stuff

pages.title: Tip:5
pages.text: Remember to alyays carry more rocket launch pads and fuel, so you can fuel your rovers as well as the ride back home.You dont want to be stranded there right?$(br2)Them natives may not be too happy

pages.title: Tip:6
pages.text: As air/Oxygen does not exist in adequate amounts outside Earth,normal torches are literally useless.$(br)HOWEVER,soul fueled burning is totally possible.As using souls as a substitute is very reliable.There is should be problem burning soul torches and campfires in outerspace.

pages.title: Tip:7
pages.text: Please use JEI in order to find out recipes for this mod.It is a $(o)Wonderful$() tool that is usually integrated with numourous mods.

pages.title: Tip:External Mod
pages.text: $(br)There are many mods that add materials that are very similar with the ones in Beyond Earth.Feel free to discover all the compatibilites to make the integrated exprience satisfying.$(br)From $(o)Tinkkers Construct$() being able to melt metals and $(o)Pipez$() being a really efficient pipes/cables mod
